title: 怎么召唤闪电劈向玩家和生物（不用调天气）
author: xiao_lihao

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content: 1.8原版用summon LightningBolt ~ ~1 ~复制代码能做到您的需求

replies.author: pca006132
replies.txt_content: execute 劈向的玩家和生物 ~ ~ ~ /summon LghtlingBolt

replies.author: nmk78
replies.txt_content:
1.8原版：
/execute @a ~ ~ ~ summon LightningBolt ~ ~ ~
在全体玩家的头上召唤一个闪电，也可以改为@e[type=XXX]XXX是指实体名
